name: net-snmp
description: A suite of software for using and deploying the SNMP protocol (v1, v2c and v3 and the AgentX subagent protocol). Contains also Python bindings.

name: SNMP++
description: BSD licensed SNMP implemention from HP. Supports SNMP v1/2c/v3, thread-safety, and many more.

name: AGENT++
description: The AGENT++ C++ framework provides a complete tri-lingual SNMP v1/2c/3 protocol engine and dispatcher for the development of SNMP agents. Apache licensed.

name: AgentX++
description: The AgentX++ C++ framework provides a complete AgentX protocol (RFC 2741) implementation that adds AgentX master and sub-agent support to AGENT++ (Commercial).

name: openSNMP
description: BSD licensed multi-threaded implementation of SNMPv3.

name: sharpSNMP
description: MIT licensed SNMP library for .NET/Xamarin/Mono.

name: SnmpSharpNet
description: Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) .Net library written in C# (csharp). Implements protocol version 1, 2 and 3.

name: Erlang/OTP SNMP
description: SNMP development is included as a component of the Erlang/Open Telecom Platform development environment.

name: gosnmp/gosnmp
description: An SNMP library written in Go. It provides Get, GetNext, GetBulk, Walk, BulkWalk, Set and Traps. It supports IPv4/IPv6, using SNMP v1/v2c/v3.

name: sleepinggenius2/gosmi)
description: MIB parser in Go language.

name: posteo/go-agentx
description: A library with a pure Go implementation of the AgentX-Protocol.

name: SNMP4J
description: SNMP4J is an enterprise class, free open source, and state-of-the-art SNMP v1/2c/v3 implementation for Java™.

name: SNMP4J-Agent
description: SNMP4J-Agent is a Java™ API on top of the core SNMP4J API for the development of SNMP agents (command responders).

name: joeSNMP
description: joeSNMP is an open-source Java SNMP class library published under the LGPL.

name: Westhawk's SNMP
description: An open-sourced Java library that can be used for SNMP v1/v2c/v3. Supports traps, authentication and privacy. As authentication protocols it offers MD5 and SHA1.

name: mibble
description: Mibble is an open-source SNMP MIB (or SMI) parser library for Java.

name: node-net-snmp
description: JavaScript implementation of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP), implements versions 1, 2c and 3.

name: node-snmp-native
description: Native JavaScript SNMP library for Node.js.

name: node-snmpjs
description: This package provides a toolkit for SNMP agents and management applications in Node.js.

name: snmp-node
description: Native JavaScript SNMP library for Node.js.

name: luasnmp
description: Lua binding to net-snmp library.

name: php.net/SNMP
description: This is an SNMP extension for PHP, which is a wrapper around the net-snmp library.

name: FreeDSx/SNMP
description: A Pure PHP SNMP Library.

name: opensolutions/OSS_SNMP
description: A PHP SNMP library for people who hate SNMP, MIBs and OIDs!

name: pysnmp
description: This is a pure-Python, open source and free implementation of v1/v2c/v3 SNMP engine distributed under 2-clause BSD license.

name: pysmi
description: PySMI is a pure-Python implementation of SNMP SMI MIB parser.

name: net-snmp Python bindings
description: Net-SNMP 5.4 and later contains Python bindings in the "python" sub-directory, though, they are not built by default.

name: puresnmp
description: Pure Python3 SNMPv2 library without any dependencies.

name: snimpy
description: Snimpy is a Python-based tool providing a simple interface to build SNMP query.

name: python-netsnmpagent
description: This package allows to write net-snmp subagents in Python.

name: hnmp
description: HNMP is a high-level Python library to ease the pain of retrieving and processing data from SNMP-capable devices such as network switches, routers, and printers.

name: aiosnmp
description: Python package aiosnmp is an asynchronous SNMP client for use with asyncio. Only SNMP v2c is supported.

name: robotframework-snmplibrary
description: SNMPLibrary is a Robot Framework test library for testing SNMP.

name: ruby-netsnmp
description: SNMP library in ruby (v1, v2c, v3).

name: snmp-parser
description: SNMP parser written in rust with nom parser combinator framework.

name: davedufresne/modern_snmp
description: Modern SNMP is a pure-Rust library for SNMPv3. This repository includes snmp_mp (SNMPv3 Message Processing) and snmp_usm (Implementation of the User-based Security Model (USM) for SNMPv3) crates.

name: Svedrin/sunt
description: This repository implements an SNMP Agent written in Rust.

name: net-snmp tools
description: The applications listed here are part of net-snmp.

name: encode_keychange
description: Produces the KeyChange string for SNMPv3.

name: snmptranslate
description: Translates MIB OID names between numeric and textual forms.

name: snmpget
description: Communicates with a network entity using SNMP GET requests.

name: snmpgetnext
description: Communicates with a network entity using SNMP GETNEXT requests.

name: snmpbulkget
description: Communicates with a network entity using SNMP GETBULK requests.

name: snmpwalk
description: Retrieves a subtree of management values using SNMP GETNEXT requests.

name: snmpbulkwalk
description: Retrieves a subtree of management values using SNMP GETBULK requests.

name: snmpset
description: Communicates with a network entity using SNMP SET requests.

name: snmptest
description: Communicates with a network entity using SNMP requests.

name: snmptable
description: Retrieve an SNMP table and display it in tabular form.

name: snmpdelta
description: Monitor delta differences in SNMP Counter values.

name: snmpusm
description: Manipulates the SNMPv3 User-based-security user table.

name: snmpvacm
description: Manipulates the SNMPv3 View-based-access-control-module configuration tables.

name: snmpstatus
description: Retrieves a fixed set of management information from a network entity.

name: snmpnetstat
description: Display networking status and configuration information from a network entity via SNMP.

name: snmpdf
description: Displays disk information like the unix df tool using information collected from SNMP.

name: snmptrap
description: Sends SNMP TRAP or INFORM notification messages.

name: snmpinform
description: Send INFORM notification messages. snmpinform command is functionally the same as snmptrap -Ci.

name: snmptrapd
description: An SNMP daemon that listens for SNMP TRAPs or INFORMs and logs or acts upon them.

name: traptoemail
description: This an snmptrapd handler script to convert snmp traps into emails.

name: net-snmp-config
description: Returns information about installed net-snmp libraries and binaries.

name: snmpconf
description: Creates and modifies SNMP configuration files.

name: fixproc
description: Fixes a process by performing the specified action.

name: snmpd
description: An SNMP agent that responds to SNMP requests for a given host.

name: mib2c
description: A MIB conversion utility that can translate MIB structures into other forms, such as C-code.

name: mib2c-update
description: This a script to merge custom code into updated mib2c code.

name: SNMP4JCLT
description: Use the SNMP4J Command Line Tool (CLT) to send SNMPv1/v2c/v3 requests and traps to a target with IPv4 or v6 based UDP, TCP, or TLSv1,2 transport (Commercial).

name: libsmi tools
description: Applications built on top of libsmi and an sh/awk script that are integrated with the libsmi distribution.

name: smilint
description: This is used to check MIB or PIB modules for syntax errors and semantics at some degree. SMIv1/v2 style MIB modules as well as SPPI PIB modules are supported.

name: smidump
description: This is a MIB/PIB compiler. It allows to dump the contents of a module in various formats: SMIv1, SMIv2, SMIng, SPPI, Import Trees, Type Definition Trees, OID Node Trees, MOSY Style, and CORBA IDL definitions according to the JIDM Specs, and others.

name: smidiff
description: This is a tool that parses two revisions of a MIB module and analyzes the modifications from the old to the new revision.

name: smiquery
description: This is a MIB/PIB query front end. It can be used to query single items from the command line.

name: smistrip
description: This is a simple shell/awk script that allows to extract MIB and PIB modules from documents, such as RFCs or Internet Drafts.

name: snmpsim
description: This is a pure-Python, open source and free implementation of SNMP agents simulator distributed under 2-clause BSD license.

name: snmpfwd
description: The SNMP Proxy Forwarder tool works as an application-level proxy with a built-in SNMP message router. Typical use case for an SNMP proxy is to work as an application-level firewall or a protocol translator that enables SNMPv3 access to a SNMPv1/SNMPv2c entity or vice versa.

name: snmpclitools
description: This is a collection of command-line SNMP tools written in pure-Python. The tools mimic their famous Net-SNMP counterparts. It includes snmpget.py, snmpset.py, snmpwalk.py, snmpbulkwalk.py, snmptrap.py, and snmptranslate.py, see here for more details.

name: snmpwn
description: SNMPwn is an SNMPv3 user enumerator and attack tool.

name: trapperkeeper
description: A suite of tools for ingesting and displaying SNMP traps. This is designed as a replacement for snmptrapd and to supplement existing stateful monitoring solutions.

name: SNMP Trap Translator
description: SNMPTT (SNMP Trap Translator) is an SNMP trap handler written in Perl for use with the Net-SNMP / UCD-SNMP snmptrapd program (www.net-snmp.org).

name: snmptt
description: SNMPTT (SNMP Trap Translator) is an SNMP trap handler written in Perl for use with the Net-SNMP / UCD-SNMP snmptrapd program (www.net-snmp.org). SNMPTT supports Linux, Unix and Windows.

name: snmpttconvert
description: Some vendors provide a file that can be imported into HP Openview using a HP Openview utility. snmpttconvert is a simple Perl script which will convert one of these files into the format used by snmptt.

name: snmpttconvertmib
description: The snmpttconvertmib is a Perl script which will read a MIB file and convert the TRAP-TYPE (v1) or NOTIFICATION-TYPE (v2) definitions into a configuration file readable by snmptt.

name: prometheus/snmp_exporter
description: This exporter is the recommended way to expose SNMP data in a format which Prometheus can ingest.

name: trailofbits/onesixtyone
description: Fast SNMP Scanner.

name: SECFORCE/SNMP-Brute
description: Fast SNMP brute force, enumeration, CISCO config downloader and password cracking script.

name: hatlord/snmpwn
description: An SNMPv3 User Enumerator and Attack tool.

name: zabbix-tools/mib2zabbix
description: This Perl script will generate a Zabbix v3 Template in XML format from an OID tree in a SNMP MIB file.

name: tkmib
description: A perl/Tk interactive graphical MIB browser for SNMP.

name: agentpp/MIB Designer
description: Use MIB Designer to create, edit, manage, and explore SMI specifications (Commercial).

name: agentpp/MIB Explorer Pro
description: Use MIB Explorer to browse, configure, test&debug, monitor, and discover SNMPv1/2c/3 entities.

name: sharpsnmp/SNMP Pro
description: A family of .NET based SNMP products, including the commercial MIB Compiler, MIB Assembly, and the open source Library.

name: paessler/snmptester
description: This tool enables you to debug SNMP activities to find communication and/or data issues in SNMP monitoring configurations. Windows.

name: ireasoning/MIB Browser
description: This tool allows users to load standard, proprietary MIBs, and even some mal-formed MIBs. It also allows them to issue SNMP requests to retrieve agent's data, or make changes to the agent. Free for personal use.

name: ireasoning/SNMP Agent Simulator
description: Free SNMP Agent Simulator Java based application that can simulate SNMPv1/v2c/v3 agents.

name: Visual SNMP
description: Visual SNMP is a simple tool for testing access to SNMP agents. Currently SNMPGET and SNMPWALK are supported with some limited funcionality.

name: muonics/Online MIB validator
description: Free online MIB/PIB Validator based on MIB Smithy SDK.

name: toni-moreno/snmpcollector
description: SnmpCollector is a full featured Generic SNMP data collector with Web Administration Interface Open Source tool which has as main goal simplify the configuration for getting data from any device which snmp protocol support and send resulting data to an influxdb backend.

name: Unbrowse SNMP
description: Unbrowse SNMP is a tool that helps to compile cryptic MIB files into an easy GUI view, retrieve and set MIB variables on devices, import snmpwalk dumps, receive traps, chart counters, and much more.

name: The Networknomicon, or SNMP Mastery by Abdul Alhazred and Michael W. Lucas
description: The Simple Network Management Protocol, SNMP, empowers you to invoke ancient standards from the void. SNMP exposes the secrets of your network and servers, and--if you're careless--reconfigures them into unspeakable nightmares. It exposes your inadequate brain to the vast alien dimensions underlying modern computing.

name: SNMP Mastery by Michael W. Lucas
description: SNMP, Simple Network Management Protocol, Four lies in one acronym?

name: SNMP MIB Handbook by Larry Walsh
description: Essential Guide to SNMP MIB Development, Use, and Diagnosis.

name: Mauro, D. and Schmidt, K., 2005. Essential SNMP: Help for System and Network Administrators. " O'Reilly Media, Inc.".
description: Essential SNMP explores both commercial and open source packages, and elements like OIDs, MIBs, community strings, and traps are covered in depth. The book contains five new chapters and various updates throughout.

name: Snmp, Snmpv2, Snmpv3, and Rmon 1 and 2 by William Stallings
description: Presents a concise, focused & practical guide to SNMP-based network & internetwork management for network administrators, managers, & designers.

name: Perkins, D. and McGinnis, E., 1997. Understanding SNMP MIBs (p. 528). Englewood Cliffs: Prentice Hall PTR.
description: The first complete, practical insider's guide to writing SNMP MIBs.

name: rfc1098
description: A Simple Network Management Protocol (version 1).

name: rfc1155
description: Structure and Identification of Management Information.

name: rfc2578
description: Structure of Management Information Version 2 (SMIv2).

name: rfc2741
description: Agent Extensibility (AgentX) Protocol Version 1.

name: rfc2742
description: Definitions of Managed Objects for Extensible SNMP Agents.

name: rfc3410
description: Introduction and Applicability Statements for Internet Standard Management Framework.

name: rfc3411
description: An Architecture for Describing Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) Management Frameworks.

name: rfc3412
description: Message Processing and Dispatching for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP).

name: rfc3413
description: Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) Applications.

name: rfc3414
description: User-based Security Model (USM) for version 3 of the

name: rfc3415
description: View-based Access Control Model (VACM) for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP).

name: rfc3416
description: Version 2 of the Protocol Operations for the Simple

name: rfc3417
description: Transport Mappings for the Simple Network Management

name: rfc3418
description: Management Information Base (MIB) for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP).

name: rfc3584
description: Coexistence between Version 1, Version 2, and Version 3 of the Internet-standard Network Management Framework.

name: rfc3826
description: The Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) Cipher Algorithm

name: rfc4088
description: Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Scheme for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP).

name: rfc5343
description: Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) Context EngineID Discovery.

name: rfc5590
description: Transport Subsystem for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP).

name: rfc5591
description: Transport Subsystem for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP).

name: rfc5592
description: Secure Shell Transport Model for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP).

name: rfc7630
description: HMAC-SHA-2 Authentication Protocols in the User-based Security Model (USM) for SNMPv3.

name: net-snmp tutorials
description: This Wiki page contains various tutorials ranging from the basics of SNMP protocol to implementation of SNMP applications and agents using net-snmp library.

name: snmp.ireasoning.com
description: Free public an SNMP agent for testing purpose.

name: hsnodgrass/snmp_mib_archive
description: An archive of over 3000 unique SNMP MIBs.

name: kcsinclair/mibs
description: Another collection of MIBS used for SNMP. Make sure to clone the repository to see the full list of MIBs.

name: mibdepot.com
description: mibDepot is a free service to the SNMP community and offers a dictionary of MIBs and a unique-in-the-industry Search Engine with over 12,000 SNMP MIBs representing over 1,800,000 MIB object definitions.

name: oid-info.com
description: This OID repository gathers information about Object Identifiers (OIDs), and provides tools to display, update and search for this information.

name: michaelfmcnamara.com
description: Hand-curated list of MIBs by Michael McNamara.

name: snmplink.org/OnLineMIB
description: This website shows documentation of a set of MIBs with a built-in MIB viewer.

name: OnLineMIB/Standards
description: Standard: (ATM Forum, IANA, RFC) - RFC1065-5324.

name: OnLineMIB/Cisco
description: Cisco.

name: OnLineMIB/Juniper
description: Juniper.

name: OnLineMIB/Extreme
description: Extreme.

name: OnLineMIB/Brocade
description: Brocade.

name: oidview.com/mibs
description: This repository contains over 7000 unique MIBs from various vendors.

name: SNMPLink.org
description: SNMPlink.org provides links and information about SNMP, MIB (Management Information Base), Network Management and Network Monitoring.

name: SNMPTools.net
description: SNMPTools.net provides links and information about SNMP applications, toolkits, gateways, simulators, MIB browsers and many more.
